content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I moved overseas and I am in a homesick. I have hard time getting accustomed to my new life.
I understand that you have been a bit apprehensive. What type of things are you looking forward to?
Maybe some local network? But I have no resource.
I know that local people are often at a loss for what to do right now. I have also had a problem in my quest for connections as well. Whereabouts do you live?
